description.en:
If the subscription is not added, you can watch the video instruction using the button below.

If nothing happens after clicking the button, add the subscription manually:

1. Click the Get Link button in the top right corner of this page
2. Copy the link
3. In Happ, go to the Profiles section
4. Paste the link in the text field
5. Click the Import button

If the subscription is not added, you can watch the video instruction using the button below.

If nothing happens after clicking the button, add the subscription manually:

3. In FlClashX, go to the Profiles section
4. Paste the link in the text field
5. Click the Import button

description.en:
Once you've added your subscription, simply tap the big power button in the center of the screen.

The app will automatically select the fastest server with the lowest latency, but you can choose any other from the list below if you wish.

description.en:
If the subscription is not added, you can watch the video instruction using the button below.

If nothing happens after clicking the button, add a subscription manually:

1. Click the Get link button on this page in the upper right corner
2. Copy the link
3. In FlClash, go to the Profiles section
4. Click the + button
5. Select the URL
6. Paste your copied link and click Send

description.en:
Select the added profile in the Profiles section.

In the Dashboard, click the enable button in the lower right corner, and then turn on the switch next to the TUN item.

After launching, in the Proxy section, you can change the choice of the server to which you will be connected.

If the subscription is not added, you can watch the video instruction using the button below.

If nothing happens after clicking the button, add the subscription manually:

title.en: If the subscription is not added
title.ru: ะัะปะธ ะฟะพะดะฟะธัะบะฐ ะฝะต ะดะพะฑะฐะฒะธะปะฐัั

description.en:
If the subscription is not added, you can watch the video instruction using the button below.

If nothing happens after clicking the button, add the subscription manually:

1. Click the Get Link button in the top right corner of this page
2. Copy the link
3. In Happ, go to the Profiles section
4. Paste the link in the text field
5. Click the Import button
